abstract: AT&T is among the bidders for Verizon Wireless‘ roughly $3 billion in wireless assets the latter must divest as part of its purchase of Alltel, The Wall Street Journal said, citing people familiar with the matter.
lead_paragraph: AT&T is among the bidders for Verizon Wireless‘ roughly $3 billion in wireless assets the latter must divest as part of its purchase of Alltel, The Wall Street Journal said, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: AT&T Said to Seek Verizon Wireless Assets

abstract: John T. Chambers is issuing one of the more optimistic forecasts from Silicon Valley -- that the United States economy will recover this year.
snippet: John T. Chambers is issuing one of the more optimistic forecasts from Silicon Valley -- that the United States economy will recover this year.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.  Cisco Systems faces a precipitous decline in sales of its networking equipment, but John T. Chambers, the chief executive, is issuing one of the more optimistic forecasts from Silicon Valley  that the United States economy will recover this year.

headline.main: Cisco’s Boss Sees Recovery Despite Poor Sales Outlook
headline.print_headline: Cisco’s Boss Sees Recovery Despite Poor Sales Outlook

abstract: Video phone calls aren’t dead, exactly, but Skype’s new program may revive interest in them.
snippet: Video phone calls aren’t dead, exactly, but Skype’s new program may revive interest in them.
lead_paragraph: When AT&T demonstrated its video telephone at the 1964 World’s Fair, everyone  including AT&T  pretty much figured that it would be the future. People wouldn’t just hear each other over the phone  they would see each other, too.
